籤詩版本二:
Nws tau hais tias nws tsis yog qhov tsis hnov ​​​​tsw, cov khaub ncaws zoo thiab cov nyiaj hli zoo yuav ua rau muaj kev vam meej
Tsis txhob nco qab tias muaj dab tsi tshwm sim thaum ntawd koj tseem pom zoo nrog kuv.
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram yog daim duab ntawm tus menyuam pom nws niam.
Hmoov zoo rau txhua tus neeg muaj koob muaj npe.
解曰: Siv rau kev cia siab. Sawv daws zoo siab. Los ntawm pej xeem quab yuam. Zoo li ib tug tub ntsib nws niam.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Zhong tab tom nrhiav rau cov txheeb ze
Dong Zhong yog tus tub ntawm Dong Yong nyob rau hauv Han Dynasty, nws yug los rau ib tug fairy taleas los saum ntuj ceeb tsheej los rau hauv ntiaj teb mus yuav Dong Yong. Tom qab ntawd, tom qab tus fairy pab Dong Yong them nws cov nuj nqis thiab txhiv nws tus kheej, nws rov qab mus rau saum ntuj ceeb tsheej.
Dong Zhong, uas muaj xya xyoo, feem ntau txaj muag vim nws tsis muaj niam, yog li nws xav nrhiav nws.
Raws li kev coj noj coj ua ntawm Ywj Pheej, Dong Zhong mus rau Taibai Roob nrhiav nws thaum Lub Xya Hli 7, Tus poj huab tais tau tshwm sim thiab thaum kawg pom nws niam.
聖意: Kuv tsis yooj yim nyob hauv tsev, Kuv zoo tib yam, Kuv thov kom muaj hmoov zoo, hmoov zoo hauv kev lag luam, kev sib yuav thiab kev sib yuav, ib tug poj niam taug kev hauv Liujia tab tom thaiv teb, silkworms muaj teeb meem, nrhiav neeg nyuaj vim qhov poob tsiaj txhu, nws nyuaj rau kev foob, kev tsiv teb tsaws chaw yog kev saib xyuas, cov khoom ploj yog khoob, cov kab mob tau thov kom muaj hmoov zoo hauv roob thiab qhov ntxa.
古人: Dong Zhong tab tom nrhiav rau cov txheeb ze
第X籤: Lub tsib caug xya rho npe
